mapper.select: SELECT tl.textbook_id, tl.id AS lesson_id, tl.`name` AS lesson_name, tl.list_order, tl.section, tl.char_count, IFNULL( ul.finished_char_count, 0 ) AS finished_char_count, IFNULL( ul.locked, 1 ) AS locked, IFNULL( ul.star_count, 0 ) AS star_count FROM sf_textbook_lesson tl LEFT JOIN sf_user_lesson ul ON ul.lesson_id = tl.id AND ul.is_deleted = 0 AND ul.user_id = #{userId} WHERE 1 = 1 AND tl.is_deleted = 0 AND tl.textbook_id = #{textbookId} AND tl.enabled = 1 ORDER BY list_order

SELECT tl.id AS lessonId, tl.textbook_id AS textbookId, tl.`name` AS lessonName, tl.list_order AS listOrder, tl.section, t.`name` AS textbookName, t.`subject`, t.lesson_count AS lessonCount, t.font FROM sf_textbook_lesson tl LEFT JOIN sf_textbook t ON tl.textbook_id = t.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND tl.is_deleted = 0 AND t.is_deleted = 0 AND tl.id = #{lessonId}

SELECT tl.textbook_id, tl.id AS lesson_id, tl.`name` AS lesson_name, tl.char_count, IFNULL( lsc.stars_n1, 0 ) AS stars_n1, IFNULL( lsc.stars_n2, 0 ) AS stars_n2, IFNULL( lsc.stars_n3, 0 ) AS stars_n3, IFNULL( ul.finished_char_count, 0 ) AS finished_char_count, IFNULL( ul.star_count, 0 ) AS star_count FROM sf_textbook_lesson tl LEFT JOIN sf_user_lesson ul ON tl.id = ul.lesson_id AND ul.is_deleted = 0 AND ul.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN sf_lesson_star_config lsc ON tl.id = lsc.lesson_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND tl.is_deleted = 0 AND tl.id = #{lessonId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sf_user_lesson ul LEFT JOIN sf_user_textbook ut ON ul.textbook_id = ut.textbook_id AND ul.user_id = ut.user_id LEFT JOIN sf_textbook_lesson tl ON ul.lesson_id = tl.id WHERE 1=1 AND tl.is_deleted = 0 AND ut.is_deleted = 0 AND ul.is_deleted = 0 AND ul.textbook_id = #{textbookId} AND ul.user_id = #{userId} AND ul.char_count = ul.finished_char_count

SELECT t4.id AS textbookId, t4.`name` AS textbookName, t4.`subject`, t4.cover_image AS coverImage, t4.font, t3.id AS lessonId, t3.`name` AS lessonName, t3.learnCount FROM sf_user_lesson t1 LEFT JOIN sf_user_textbook t2 ON t1.textbook_id = t2.textbook_id AND t1.user_id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t1.*, COUNT(t2.id) AS learnCount FROM sf_textbook_lesson t1 LEFT JOIN sf_user_lesson t2 ON t1.id = t2.lesson_id AND t2.is_deleted = 0 WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY t1.id ) AS t3 ON t1.lesson_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN sf_textbook t4 ON t1.textbook_id = t4.id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.is_deleted = 0 AND t1.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY t1.modify_date DESC LIMIT #{number}
